JUNE 17–19, 2020

Adjusting Summer Course – Southampton, UK

Designed to combine a quality lesson and workshop programme with safety training to provide an enjoyable and worthwhile learning experience for insurance claims personnel and risk managers.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1575603434627{border-bottom-width: 1px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;border-bottom-color: #00a3ad !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1575603452209{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”9609″ onclick=”custom_link” css=”.vc_custom_1578284809424{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}” link=”https://aqualisbraemar.com/courses-and-events/falmouth-port-shipyard-familiarisation-course/”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1575603445891{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

DATES TBA

Port & Shipyard Familiarisation Course – Falmouth, UK

AqualisBraemar’s technical division offer a short intensive two day course with the aim of introducing marine insurance professionals to the basic technical aspects of damage encountered in marine losses, their surveying, investigating, reporting techniques and general overview of marine insurance.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1575603434627{border-bottom-width: 1px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;border-bottom-color: #00a3ad !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1575603452209{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”9836″ onclick=”custom_link” css=”.vc_custom_1578284825556{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}” link=”https://aqualisbraemar.com/courses-and-events/ship-familiarisation-course-dubai/”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1575603445891{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

DATES TBA

Ship Familiarisation Course – Dubai, UAE

This course is / was primarily intended for younger claims handlers, brokers, lawyers etc., all of whom may deal with casualties and surveys in their daily work, but who have generally had no seagoing experience or even been on board one of the vessels or units which they deal with.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1575603434627{border-bottom-width: 1px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;border-bottom-color: #00a3ad !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1575603452209{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”9616″ onclick=”custom_link” css=”.vc_custom_1578284999930{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}” link=”https://aqualisbraemar.com/courses-and-events/shipyard-acquaint-course-piraeus/”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1575603445891{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

DATES TBA

Shipyard Acquaint Course – Piraeus, Greece

A short intensive three day course with the aim of introducing marine insurance professionals to the basic technical aspects of damage encountered in marine losses, their surveying, investigating and reporting techniques.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1575603434627{border-bottom-width: 1px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;border-bottom-color: #00a3ad !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1575603452209{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”9630″ onclick=”custom_link” css=”.vc_custom_1578284861062{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}” link=”https://aqualisbraemar.com/courses-and-events/marine-energy-construction-repair-yard-course/”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1575603445891{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text]
